Hotel Shanker
8 Very good
Based on 1099 reviews

I got a promotional price at that time and it was quite cheap for that kind of hotel class. The hotel is located in the heart of Kathmandu, it was very near to Narayanhiti Palace and quite close to thamel.

During my stay, the hotel was going under renovation and the main entrance was closed, however they had a side entrance to the hotel, which looked a bit disappointing. The hallway is confusing to go to my room or exit from the hotel and they are bit dark during the night time. They had various types of breakfast, which were of average rating. The staff was helpful and friendly. The hotel has a average sized swimming pool and it was nice and clean. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Show more
Adita Devanty , Indonesia
Hyatt Regency Kathmandu
8.1 Excellent
Based on 236 reviews

Quite & Calm, Safe & Sound, Secured

Imran Siddiqui , Bangladesh
Hotel Yak & Yeti
7.7 Very good
Based on 146 reviews

We enjoyed the restful setting and good service, nice food. A few features of the old Nepalese Palace still remain which took us back in time .

Friendly staff took us on a private tour

Show more
Janice Thomas , Australia
Gaju Suite Hotel
8.5 Excellent
Based on 541 reviews

After a very long layover in China, it was wonderful coming to a clean, welcoming hotel with nice rooms.

Show more
Wendy Wester , United States
Avataar Kathmandu Hotel
8.4 Excellent
Based on 353 reviews

I have nothing but praises for this hotel. From the airport pick-up, to friendly staff and manager who talks to the guests and make them feel at home, to the superb breakfast, excellent location (on a quiet street in Thamel), everything is just perfect! I was even given a free upgrade on my last day of stay, just what I needed from an exhausting 8-day trip in Nepal.

Dont hesitate to book this hotel, just do it!

Show more
Richard Lew Jumao-as , Philippines
Dwarika's Hotel
8.8 Excellent
Based on 53 reviews

Our family (3 adults, 2 young children) had a fabulous time at Dwarika's Hotel. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed warmly by the wonderful staff.

We were greeted with cold towels and fresh juice and loved the fruit basket, cookies, and assortment of teas/coffees in our room. The buffet breakfast had tremendous variety and the courtyard makes a pleasant location for a meal. Our suite was spacious and tastefully decorated. The pool area is lovely and we enjoyed having a drink at the bar in the evening. My only complaints were that (1) we had contacted the hotel for airport pick-up (which was confirmed) but no one showed up for us and we had to take a taxi and (2) there was some kind of bug in our room (not a mosquito) that bit our poor baby all over her face.

Show more
Nicole Probst , United States
Hotel de l' Annapurna
7.2 Very good
Based on 104 reviews

We stayed for 6 nights and enjoyed every moment of our stay. The hotel's restaurant has some nice food to offer.

One of the best places to stay in Kathmandu!

Show more
Syed Adil Altaf Bukhari , India
Hotel Shambala
8.3 Excellent
Based on 76 reviews

spent 2 nights there after arriving in Kathmandu, then after 2 nights in Nagarkot hilltop village came back to Shambala.

By far the best hotel I stayed in while in Nepal. Breakfast was 1st class as was the staff,also comfortable clean room. After returning from walking around the chaotic streets it was so nice to have a relaxing massage in the Spa followed by dinner in the hotel restaurant. The reception staff helped me to arrange a flight over the Himalayas and the magnificent Mt. Everest for a never to be forgotten experience. Will recommend Shambala to all my friends.

Show more
James Coburn , United Kingdom
Kathmandu Guest House
7.4 Very good
Based on 374 reviews

We had finish a week of travelling through india and wanted a few days to relax. We asked if we could upgrade our room and we ended getting an amazing room that was perfect.

The staff are very friendly and helpful. The tea garden in a nice peaceful spot to relax.

Show more
Shaun Forke , Australia
Kantipur Temple House
8.2 Excellent
Based on 285 reviews

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Kantipur Temple House and will definitely come back on my next trip to Kathmandu.

As an expert on "livability", this hotel offers many great features that reduce our impact on the earth.

Show more

Hotel Himalaya

Based on 62 reviews

Large room with great views of city and mountains

Middle of Thamel , Room is Nice, Service is Good. Plan to stay here if visit Nepal again

Club Himalaya, by ACE Hotels

I think best place to stay mice view u can see Himayai from room but in the clean sky may br Morning 10 to 1 pm between u can see it .

nice room very romentic place i like it a lot

Awesome for couples !!!

Jeganath Balasubramaniam , Malaysia
Hotel Shangri-La
7.1 Very good
Based on 61 reviews

very comfortable, staff friendly, on third visit were upgraded to Suite room the breakfast was very good, attended the barbeque, a lot of variety of food for meals transport was easy to get to go to town , Dissapointed that hotel did not make arrangements to pick up or sent to airport unlike other hotels in Nepal.

Would recommended this hotel to people who can afford it, the garden is very nice. many helpers in the hotel.

Show more
jaswant kaur , Malaysia
Hotel Country Villa
8.1 Excellent
Based on 162 reviews

Wonderful hotel environment and can enjoy beautiful scenery of the mountain and nagarkot village. nice breakfast and dinner (which is clean, tasty and at the price more or less the same as any restaurants outside) Excellent customer service, responsive, helpful, friendly and attentive.

Clean and tidy room with balcony facing mountain view.

Show more
Chu Chi Chau , China
Kathmandu Grand Hotel
9.2 Exceptional
Based on 95 reviews

Hotel with great location. Helpful staff, clean room and good breakfast. Overall execelant!

Devanathan Seperamaniam , Malaysia
Aria Boutique Hotel & Spa
8.9 Excellent
Based on 196 reviews

quite good for shopping and attractions , but no lift or elevator so have to walk the steps all the time.

.

Show more
Dilip Reddy , India
Hotel The Coast
8.7 Excellent
Based on 65 reviews

We enjoyed our stay. We were allocated Room 501 which had a lake view when on the balcony only, but when we booked we had the idea that we would get direct view of the lake from the bed (Room 503/403/303/203), but that did not happen.

When inquired they said that all their rooms were lake view rooms which is grammatically correct. They can correctly re-designate rooms and, may be, charge a little bit more for Rooms 503/403/203 as those were really special. We did not find the position of the hotel on the city map nor the taxi driver could easily identify, but with help from other more conversant cab drivers. When inquired, they informed that the hotel is new and that could be the reason of such disadvantage.

Show more
Muhammad Azizur Rahman , Bangladesh
Dalai La Boutique Hotel
9.1 Exceptional
Based on 61 reviews

I think this Hotel is The Best Hotel in Nepal !! Location,Atomosphere,staff,restaurant,breakfast,all of it, so great!! Especially I like Personality of Owner !! I think he loves this Hotel very much , I never met the Owner like him !! This Hotel's service is Excellent !! Next time I visit Nepal again, I absolutely wii stay this Hotel " Dalai La " !!

Superhelpful staff and nice place to stay

Hotel Tibet International

Based on 219 reviews

My first time to visit Nepal and staff in Hotel really look after me. I requested to be pick up from Airport and This hotel is a great place to start with, I can walked to Bouddhanath at Sun rise and Sunset is really exciting time.

After long day sightseeing Went to spa massage spoke with owner nice people. I'm very satisfied staying at this hotel. I will come again to Nepal and stay at the same hotel.

- very good view and place in the city - nice service - OK facilities - little bit old hotel, need WIFI free in public area at least

1) New 2) nice garden 3) excellent location

Gokarna Forest Resort

Staff was wonderful. The rooms were very comfortable. The meals in the dining room were excellent. Even better was one night, having a meal from the same menu by the fire in the bar (lounge).

Be sure to take the guided walk in the forest.

Rupakot Resort

Mount Kailash Resort

Donna Doherty , Canada
Dwarika's Resort - Dhulikhel
9.6 Exceptional
Based on 42 reviews

Raniban Retreat
8.4 Excellent
Based on 129 reviews

Raniban Retreat is a bit difficult to get to. Once you arrive the staff will meat you at the stairs, carry your bags, & escort you to the hotel.

Once you arrive at the top you are instantly overwhelmed with the view and the kindness of the Raniban staff. The early morning view is beyond description. The food was excellent and I will stay at the Raniban Retreat on my next visit to Pokhura. The Raniban Retreat is also just a short hike from the World Peace Pagoda.

Show more
Gary D Bullard , United States
Grand Norling Hotel's Resort
8.6 Excellent
Based on 15 reviews

Waterfront Resort
8.1 Excellent
Based on 155 reviews

Manager is very friendly, he arranged a car to take us look around Pokhara, see sunset and sunrise although we saw nothing because it's not right season.

Also with manager's help, we rent a great car to take us come/back between Kathmandu and Nagarkot.

Show more

Atithi Resort & Spa

Very welcoming the reception we received. The hotel is kept very tidy by a very responsive attendance staff.

Great variety with the breakfast options. We also received a complimentary drop off to the airport on the house! Will definitely be returning when we are back in Pokhara

Chandra Ban Retreat
9.2 Exceptional

TigerLand Safari Resort

Based on 1 reviews

Lumbini Buddha Garden Resort
8 Very good
Based on 38 reviews

Lumbini Buddha Garden is a very recommendable unique eco-friendly nature-oriented spread of garden and bungalows run in association with a wildlife conservation and research NGO that also does local treeplanting and education.

Dinesh, the friendly and efficient manager, is a knowledgeable bird-lover, who can introduce you to the graceful Sarus crane, the world's tallest flying bird, and many other species. (Even wild antelopes visited the garden while we were there). We borrowed bicycles to explore the Lumbini complex; easy access. I liked how there's no formal reception desk or tour office lobby (though Dinesh can handle all requests for travel arrangements etc, and inter-city buses can drop off or pick up passengers at the gate) -- simply a genuine warm welcome and a very peaceful environment that lives up to the name, Lumbini Buddha Garden. (Just make sure the bus driver doesn't confuse your destination with Lumbini Garden Hotel, down by the dusty village center...)

Show more
Ken Rodgers , Australia
Bhanjyang Village Lodge
8.2 Excellent
Based on 27 reviews

Even upon check in facility is not ready.As we book 3 month ahead Hotel owner explain for us that only 3 of us will stay in hotel tonight as they didn't accept any booking due to some water problem.

Somehow they try to serve us at best, they carry water from down the hill and bring food to cook for us even thing was slow but your can know that they do thier best to ensure that we enjoy our and it's does.Breakfast and dinner is not included but you can order and price is acceptable. Dish look simply but tasty. Here is the most beautiful view during our stay in Nepal and we wake up and see fish tail Mt. just right in front and have breakfast with himalayan range view. Room facility is not at best but their service mind can make our stay at best. It's totaly worth my sigle dollar spending here.

Show more

Best starting point if you are to do hiking.

The owners were warm and welcoming, helpful and informative. I fell in love with my delightful room and felt like a princess.

Breakfast great and the coffee shop food delicious. Close to shopping where you are made to feel welcome by traders and the history and beautiful buildings in Bhaktapur are breathtaking.

Nice clean bathrooms too.

Shree Tibet Family Guest House

Stay at this guest house was the best choose, its quiet place with really nice, clean rooms, advantageous location and very friendly and nice stuff ready to help and always smiling.

I reccomend this guesthouse and would come again if i ever came back ;)

Hotel Heritage
9 Excellent
Based on 21 reviews

Hotel Bright Star
8.9 Excellent
Based on 124 reviews

This hotel is highly recommended, especially the very friendly and helpful staff. Mr. Gopan and Ms. Mayam arranged the transportation to Pokhara and Nagarkot for us since it's hard to book one due to holidays.

Overall, if you're looking for quality service on a budget, then Hotel Bright Star is by far the best option.

Show more
Ronald Jason Collantes , Philippines
Acme Guest House
7.9 Very good
Based on 102 reviews

Great Value, Amazing Location, Quiet at night

Roy Blatt , Israel
Boudha Stupa View Guest House
5.8 Review score
Based on 2 reviews

Yamba Traditional Home
9.6 Exceptional
Based on 3 reviews

Blue Mountain Home Stay
8.6 Excellent
Based on 171 reviews

I have only good things to say about my time at Blue Mountain Homestay. I have never had such a wonderful experience at a hotel, hostel, or homestay.

We have been traveling for four months now, and our stay with mr Buddhi and his family was hands down the best experience we've had. I would come back to kathmandu just to stay in the homestay again. The beds are large, the rooms are clean, the showers are hot, and the breakfast is great. Mr Buddhi and his family are unbelievably kind and accommodating - you will truly feel like you're part of the family. Kinder people do not exist - stay here!

Show more
Emily Smith , United States
Hotel Yala Peak
8 Very good
Based on 14 reviews

The staff here are very helpful, when I had a problem with my room they changed me to another room. When I got sick they postponed my bus trip until the next day.

The restaurant downstairs is excellent.

Show more
Eric Jessup , United States
Tulaja Boutique Hotel
9 Excellent
Based on 4 reviews

3 Rooms by The Paulines
6 Review score
Based on 2 reviews

Cosy Hotel
8.5 Excellent
Based on 174 reviews

The hotel's location is very convenient in exploring the interesting places in Bhaktapur. The room is pretty and the bed is comfortable.

Hot water is available 24/7 and internet is also working well.

Show more
Grazelle Magto , Philippines
Happiness Guest House
8 Very good
Based on 8 reviews

Kathmandu Madhuban Guest House
7.6 Very good
Based on 127 reviews

It's the first time I had booked a guesthouse via Agoda and I felt happily for my choice. Guesthouse locate in Thamel area, 5 minutes walking to centre of Thamel, and 15 minutes walking to Kathmandu Dubar Square.

Clean and wide rooms witth private bathroom, but hotwater only in the morning. At time I was there, electrical power is only 10 hours per day, because of lack power in Nepal. Wifi free in reception room, even sometime tea or coffee free here. The manager and staffs are friendly, give me alot of helpful advice, and book for me a nice tour around Kathmandu and Lumbini. Kathmandu Madhuban Guest House is one of the best choice in Kathmandu.

Show more
TAN TRUONG TU , Vietnam
Hotel The Cherry Garden
8.9 Excellent
Based on 43 reviews

Very nice hotel! Clean and nice! A garden that you can relax and having tea in there. Friendly staffs!!! Everything was so great! Will come back again!

Planning a trip to Asia? Perhaps you'd like to visit some of the continent's most popular travel destinations, like Nepal. Agoda.com understands that traveler want to get the best deal. That's why we offer you the best online rates at 1262 hotels nationwide. Consisting of 14 regions, each with its own unique appeal, the country offers visitors plenty of different areas to explore. The country offers 28 unique cities to discover such as Kathmandu, Pokhara, Nagarkot. With our best price guarantee, we are determined to offer you the best hotels at the best prices.

The hotel is located in the heart of Kathmandu, it was very near to Narayanhiti Palace and quite close to thamel. During my stay, the hotel was going under renovation and the main entrance was closed, however they had a side entrance to the hotel, which looked a bit disappointing. The hallway is confusing to go to my room or exit from the hotel and they are bit dark during the night time. They had various types of breakfast, which were of average rating. The staff was helpful and friendly. The hotel has a average sized swimming pool and it was nice and clean. I would definitely recommend this hotel. Show more Adita Devanty , Indonesia Hyatt Regency Kathmandu 8.1 Excellent Based on 236 reviews Quite & Calm, Safe & Sound, Secured Imran Siddiqui , Bangladesh Hotel Yak & Yeti 7.7 Very good Based on 146 reviews We enjoyed the restful setting and good service, nice food. A few features of the old Nepalese Palace still remain which took us back in time . Friendly staff took us on a private tour Show more Janice Thomas , Australia Gaju Suite Hotel 8.5 Excellent Based on 541 reviews After a very long layover in China, it was wonderful coming to a clean, welcoming hotel with nice rooms. Show more Wendy Wester , United States Avataar Kathmandu Hotel 8.4 Excellent Based on 353 reviews I have nothing but praises for this hotel. From the airport pick-up, to friendly staff and manager who talks to the guests and make them feel at home, to the superb breakfast, excellent location (on a quiet street in Thamel), everything is just perfect! I was even given a free upgrade on my last day of stay, just what I needed from an exhausting 8-day trip in Nepal. Dont hesitate to book this hotel, just do it! Show more Richard Lew Jumao-as , Philippines Dwarika's Hotel 8.8 Excellent Based on 53 reviews Our family (3 adults, 2 young children) had a fabulous time at Dwarika's Hotel. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed warmly by the wonderful staff. We were greeted with cold towels and fresh juice and loved the fruit basket, cookies, and assortment of teas/coffees in our room. The buffet breakfast had tremendous variety and the courtyard makes a pleasant location for a meal. Our suite was spacious and tastefully decorated. The pool area is lovely and we enjoyed having a drink at the bar in the evening. My only complaints were that (1) we had contacted the hotel for airport pick-up (which was confirmed) but no one showed up for us and we had to take a taxi and (2) there was some kind of bug in our room (not a mosquito) that bit our poor baby all over her face. Show more Nicole Probst , United States Hotel de l' Annapurna 7.2 Very good Based on 104 reviews We stayed for 6 nights and enjoyed every moment of our stay. The hotel's restaurant has some nice food to offer. One of the best places to stay in Kathmandu! Show more Syed Adil Altaf Bukhari , India Hotel Shambala 8.3 Excellent Based on 76 reviews spent 2 nights there after arriving in Kathmandu, then after 2 nights in Nagarkot hilltop village came back to Shambala. By far the best hotel I stayed in while in Nepal. Breakfast was 1st class as was the staff,also comfortable clean room. After returning from walking around the chaotic streets it was so nice to have a relaxing massage in the Spa followed by dinner in the hotel restaurant. The reception staff helped me to arrange a flight over the Himalayas and the magnificent Mt. Everest for a never to be forgotten experience. Will recommend Shambala to all my friends. Show more James Coburn , United Kingdom Kathmandu Guest House 7.4 Very good Based on 374 reviews We had finish a week of travelling through india and wanted a few days to relax. We asked if we could upgrade our room and we ended getting an amazing room that was perfect. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The tea garden in a nice peaceful spot to relax. Show more Shaun Forke , Australia Kantipur Temple House 8.2 Excellent Based on 285 reviews I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Kantipur Temple House and will definitely come back on my next trip to Kathmandu. As an expert on "livability", this hotel offers many great features that reduce our impact on the earth. Jeganath Balasubramaniam , Malaysia Hotel Shangri-La 7.1 Very good Based on 61 reviews very comfortable, staff friendly, on third visit were upgraded to Suite room the breakfast was very good, attended the barbeque, a lot of variety of food for meals transport was easy to get to go to town , Dissapointed that hotel did not make arrangements to pick up or sent to airport unlike other hotels in Nepal. Would recommended this hotel to people who can afford it, the garden is very nice. many helpers in the hotel. Clean and tidy room with balcony facing mountain view. Show more Chu Chi Chau , China Kathmandu Grand Hotel 9.2 Exceptional Based on 95 reviews Hotel with great location. Helpful staff, clean room and good breakfast. Overall execelant! Devanathan Seperamaniam , Malaysia Aria Boutique Hotel & Spa 8.9 Excellent Based on 196 reviews quite good for shopping and attractions , but no lift or elevator so have to walk the steps all the time. . Show more Dilip Reddy , India Hotel The Coast 8.7 Excellent Based on 65 reviews We enjoyed our stay. We were allocated Room 501 which had a lake view when on the balcony only, but when we booked we had the idea that we would get direct view of the lake from the bed (Room 503/403/303/203), but that did not happen. When inquired they said that all their rooms were lake view rooms which is grammatically correct. They can correctly re-designate rooms and, may be, charge a little bit more for Rooms 503/403/203 as those were really special. We did not find the position of the hotel on the city map nor the taxi driver could easily identify, but with help from other more conversant cab drivers. When inquired, they informed that the hotel is new and that could be the reason of such disadvantage. After long day sightseeing Went to spa massage spoke with owner nice people. I'm very satisfied staying at this hotel. I will come again to Nepal and stay at the same hotel. Ahmed AlHilou , United Arab Emirates Temple Tree Resort & Spa 8.4 Excellent Based on 119 reviews 1) New 2) nice garden 3) excellent location Osama Alhaddad , Bahrain Gokarna Forest Resort 8.4 Excellent Based on 159 reviews Staff was wonderful. Show more Suzanne Anderson , United States Rupakot Resort 9 Excellent Based on 9 reviews Mount Kailash Resort 8.5 Excellent Based on 68 reviews Friendly staff, spacious and comfortable room, clean wester-style bathroom Donna Doherty , Canada Dwarika's Resort - Dhulikhel 9.6 Exceptional Based on 42 reviews Raniban Retreat 8.4 Excellent Based on 129 reviews Raniban Retreat is a bit difficult to get to. Once you arrive the staff will meat you at the stairs, carry your bags, & escort you to the hotel. Once you arrive at the top you are instantly overwhelmed with the view and the kindness of the Raniban staff. The early morning view is beyond description. The food was excellent and I will stay at the Raniban Retreat on my next visit to Pokhura. The Raniban Retreat is also just a short hike from the World Peace Pagoda. Show more Gary D Bullard , United States Grand Norling Hotel's Resort 8.6 Excellent Based on 15 reviews Waterfront Resort 8.1 Excellent Based on 155 reviews Manager is very friendly, he arranged a car to take us look around Pokhara, see sunset and sunrise although we saw nothing because it's not right season. Also with manager's help, we rent a great car to take us come/back between Kathmandu and Nagarkot. Will definitely be returning when we are back in Pokhara Show more Umar Anas , United Kingdom Kasara Resort 10 Exceptional Based on 2 reviews Da Yatra Courtyard Hotel & Resort 7.5 Very good Based on 4 reviews Riverside Spring Resort 8.2 Excellent Based on 7 reviews Hotel Sapana Village Lodge Chitwan 8.6 Excellent Based on 47 reviews very beautiful hotel,they have elephants,nice staff Jian Tang , China Himalayan Height Resort 5.6 Review score Based on 8 reviews Namo Buddha Resort- Kavre 8.8 Excellent Based on 13 reviews Shivapuri Heights Cottage 9.4 Exceptional Based on 25 reviews Location, Cottage and Atomosphere Yuki Ito , Japan Rhino Lodge & Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 21 reviews Chandra Ban Retreat 9.2 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews TigerLand Safari Resort 10 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Lumbini Buddha Garden Resort 8 Very good Based on 38 reviews Lumbini Buddha Garden is a very recommendable unique eco-friendly nature-oriented spread of garden and bungalows run in association with a wildlife conservation and research NGO that also does local treeplanting and education. Dinesh, the friendly and efficient manager, is a knowledgeable bird-lover, who can introduce you to the graceful Sarus crane, the world's tallest flying bird, and many other species. (Even wild antelopes visited the garden while we were there). We borrowed bicycles to explore the Lumbini complex; easy access. I liked how there's no formal reception desk or tour office lobby (though Dinesh can handle all requests for travel arrangements etc, and inter-city buses can drop off or pick up passengers at the gate) -- simply a genuine warm welcome and a very peaceful environment that lives up to the name, Lumbini Buddha Garden. (Just make sure the bus driver doesn't confuse your destination with Lumbini Garden Hotel, down by the dusty village center...) Show more Ken Rodgers , Australia Bhanjyang Village Lodge 8.2 Excellent Based on 27 reviews Even upon check in facility is not ready.As we book 3 month ahead Hotel owner explain for us that only 3 of us will stay in hotel tonight as they didn't accept any booking due to some water problem. Somehow they try to serve us at best, they carry water from down the hill and bring food to cook for us even thing was slow but your can know that they do thier best to ensure that we enjoy our and it's does.Breakfast and dinner is not included but you can order and price is acceptable. Dish look simply but tasty. Here is the most beautiful view during our stay in Nepal and we wake up and see fish tail Mt. just right in front and have breakfast with himalayan range view. Room facility is not at best but their service mind can make our stay at best. It's totaly worth my sigle dollar spending here.
